Question
========

Which statement about a random effect in a linear mixed model is TRUE?

A random effect is... 
Answerlist
----------
* ...an unobserved variable that takes on 1 estimated value.
* ...an observed variable that can take on different values.
* ...an observed variable with a standardized normal distribution.
* ...an unobserved variable with mean 0 and unknown variance.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
